common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/lazpay/v1/payment/notify')
request.add_api_parameter("paymentRequestId", "TEST209903900")
request.add_api_parameter("paymentId", "20990390032220209000280158010")
request.add_api_parameter("paymentAmount", "{\"amount\": \"113\", \"currency\": \"THB\"     }")
request.add_api_parameter("paymentStatus", "SUCCESS")
request.add_api_parameter("paymentApplyTime", "1646665620233")
request.add_api_parameter("paymentFinishTime", "1646665620233")
request.add_api_parameter("productCode", "productCode")
request.add_api_parameter("merchantInfo", "merchantInfo")
request.add_api_parameter("promotionInfo", "promotionInfo")
request.add_api_parameter("userPaymentAmount", "userPaymentAmount")
response = client.execute(request)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/lazpay/v1/payment/notify')
request.add_api_param('paymentRequestId', 'TEST209903900')
request.add_api_param('paymentId', '20990390032220209000280158010')
request.add_api_param('paymentAmount', '{\"amount\": \"113\", \"currency\": \"THB\"     }')
request.add_api_param('paymentStatus', 'SUCCESS')
request.add_api_param('paymentApplyTime', '1646665620233')
request.add_api_param('paymentFinishTime', '1646665620233')
request.add_api_param('productCode', 'productCode')
request.add_api_param('merchantInfo', 'merchantInfo')
request.add_api_param('promotionInfo', 'promotionInfo')
request.add_api_param('userPaymentAmount', 'userPaymentAmount')
response = client.execute(request)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
